paper_abstract: We show that some simple and useful stutter-invariant properties definable in the language of Lamport's Simple Temporal Logic of Actions (STLA) are not definable in STLA and present a natural extension of STLA that allows one to express all stutter-invariant properties definable in the language of STLA. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Invariance under stuttering in a temporal logic of actions
